name: ctUserSwitcheroo
description: Use this task to map user context in workflows and plugins
author: cloudThing Ltd
helpMarkDown: Looks for every plugin step/workflow in the source instance set to run as the specified user, and sets the corresponding step/workflow in the target instance to run as the user specified for the target. Simples!

inputs.name: sourceOrg
inputs.label: Source Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full connection string for the source organisation where the access team templates are mastered. Ensure you use the 'RequireNewInstance' parameter!

inputs.name: targetOrg
inputs.label: Target Org Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full connection string for the target organisation where the access team templates are to be copied. Ensure you use the 'RequireNewInstance' parameter!

inputs.name: sourceUser
inputs.label: Source User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: the existing owner/context of the source data

inputs.name: targetUser
inputs.label: Target User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: who should the owner/context change to
